tool_description: Collects current and historical price data for specified products from multiple e-commerce platforms with configurable collection frequency.

product_ids.description: Array of product identifiers to collect price data for

platforms.description: Array of platform names to collect from

collection_frequency.description: How often to collect data: hourly, daily, weekly

include_historical.description: Whether to include historical price data

historical_days.description: Number of days of historical data to collect

include_shipping.description: Whether to include shipping costs in price calculation

include_tax.description: Whether to include estimated tax in price calculation

error_messages: Invalid product_ids: Array cannot be empty and must contain valid product identifiers
Invalid platforms: Array cannot be empty and must contain supported platform names
Invalid collection_frequency: Must be one of hourly, daily, weekly
Invalid historical_days: Must be between 1 and 365 days
Product not found: One or more product IDs could not be found on specified platforms
Rate limit exceeded: Too many requests. Reduce collection frequency or number of products
usage: Provide product_ids and platforms arrays to collect price data. Configure collection_frequency and historical data options as needed. The tool returns current prices and historical data for analysis.

collection_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when data was collected

current_prices.description: Array of current prices corresponding to product_ids

historical_prices.description: Array of historical price averages for each product

price_timestamps.description: Array of ISO 8601 timestamps for historical data points
